app_description.message: Increase browser speed and reduce memory load when you have numerous open tabs.

options_period02.message: minutes (zero to disable) when the number of inactive tabs exceeds

options_period04.message: Maximum number of tabs to check for discarding per single automatic discarding request

options_url_based.message: Only discard the following inactive hostnames or regular expression rules

options_tab_context.message: Display discarding items in the "tab" context menu (if supported)

options_page_context.message: Display discarding items in the "page" context menu

options_link_context.message: Display "Open in New Discarded Tab" item in the "link" context menu

options_favicon.message: Change favicon of discarded tabs (if possible)

options_prepends.message: Prepend a symbol to the discarded tabs (e.g. üí§ or ‚èªÔ∏é) (if possible)

options_startup_unpinned.message: Discard all unpinned tabs on a browser or extension startup

options_startup_pinned.message: Discard all pinned tabs on a browser or extension startup

options_startup_release_pinned.message: Release discarding state of all pinned tabs on a browser or extension startup

options_release_next_tab.message: Release discarding of the next tab (tab to the right of the active tab)

options_release_previous_tab.message: Release discarding of the previous tab (tab to the left of the active tab)

options_memory.message: Discard a background tab if its memory usage (totalJSHeapSize) exceeds (in MB)

options_audio.message: Do not discard a tab when media is playing

options_pinned.message: Do not discard a tab when it is pinned

options_form.message: Do not discard a tab when form changes are not yet submitted

options_battery.message: Do not discard tabs when computer is connected to a power source

options_online.message: Do not discard tabs when there is no internet connection and tab is not cached

options_notification_permission.message: Do not discard a tab if it can display desktop notifications

options_idle.message: Do not discard tabs if computer is not in the 'idle' state

options_idle_timeout.message: Inactive interval to determine if the computer is in idle state or not (in minutes)

options_whitelist.message: Tabs with the following hostnames or regular expression rules are not being discarded:

options_click_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

options_click_release_window.message: Release Other Tabs in This Window

options_click_toggle_allowed.message: Toggle 'Keep This Tab for This Session' option

options_plugin_dummy.message: When discarding, replace the page with a local dummy alternative (beta)

options_plugin_blank.message: Open a temporary blank page when all tabs in an inactive window are discarded (to be able to discard the active tab on this window)

options_plugin_focus.message: Release discarding of all tabs in the active window. If enabled, no tab in the active window will be discarded

options_plugin_unloaded.message: Discard all unloaded tabs on browser startup. This method discards almost all inactive tabs

options_plugin_trash.message: Permanently delete (remove) old discarded tabs if they are inactive for (in hours)

options_plugin_trash_whitelist.message: Only trash tabs matching the following URL patterns

options_plugin_force.message: Immediately discard the following hostnames when their tab is not active

options_plugin_new.message: Discard all newly opened inactive tabs after they get loaded

options_go_hidden.message: Discard a tab if it is hidden

options_use_cache.message: Use Cache: If enabled, the extension only checks once whether a tab is pinned or the browser is connected to a battery source

options_simultaneous_jobs.message: Number of allowed simultaneous discarding jobs

options_footnote_1.message: It is possible to use regular expression matching with "re:" keyword. For instance to whitelist all URLs with "google" keyword in them use "re:google".

options_footnote_2.message: Check the totalJSHeapSize value of top document. If this memory exceeds the user-defined value (minimum acceptable value is 10MB), the tab will be discarded. Note that this option is only available if your browser supports 'window.performance.memory'

options_footnote_4.message: To use a custom time interval for a rule, add @{number}{unit} to the end (e.g.: google.com@3d will trash google.com URLs after 3 days). Valid units are (h)ours, (d)ays, (w)weeks, and (mo)nths

options_favicon_delay.message: Delay for painting the discarded favicon (in milliseconds)

popup_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

popup_whitelist_always_title.message: Click to add the hostname to the exception list. Shift + Click to add the exact URL to the exception list

popup_allowed.message: Keep This Tab for This Session

popup_release.message: Release discarding. To bypass cached content use Shift + Click

popup_shift_hint.message: Use Shift key to ignore exceptions

bg_msg_1.message: auto-discarding is disabled for this tab

menu_whitelist_domain.message: Always Keep Tabs for This Site

menu_msg1.message: is added to the permanent whitelist

menu_msg4.message: is added to the session whitelist

menu_msg3.message: Cannot discard a tab when it is active

cmd_discard_window.message: Discard Other Tabs in This Window

cmd_whitelist_domain.message: Always Keep Tabs for This Site

blank_msg.message: All tabs in this window are discarded! Click anywhere to close this tab.
